snippet.title: Black Magic [Windows / 1997] (ブラックマジック) Gameplay - Mission 3 [No Commentary]
snippet.description:
Just a demonstration of your typical gameplay. Unfortunately I happened to choose a very boring escort mission to record, but you get the gist of it. I recommend using Youtube's fast forward feature if you intend on watching it, the gameplay is very slow normally.

https://archive.org/details/BlackMagicShirow

I don't think I'll continue with this game, it's not very interesting to me.
